menu.naming.title: Enter your name
menu.confirm.title: Is this name correct?
menu.confirm.title.toriel: I think you should&think of your own&name, my child.
menu.confirm.title.papyru: ALAS, A LETTER AWAY FROM A COOL NAME.&BUT I'LL ALLOW IT!!!!
menu.confirm.title.noelle: Are you sure, you can't&take another name...?
menu.confirm.title.berdly: I know this name is awesome&but it stays MINE!
menu.confirm.title.ralsei: Sorry to tell you that but...&That's my name.
menu.confirm.title.dess: You just can't pick&your own name??!!
menu.confirm.title.lancer: Hohoho! What a cool name!&But It think it's someone else's...
menu.confirm.title.queen: Oh Sorry But There Cannot&Two Queen
